00009         ( std::ostringstream() << std::dec << x ) ).str()

00011 MainWindow::MainWindow(QWidget *parent) :
00012   QMainWindow(parent),
00013   m_ui(new Ui::MainWindow)
00014 {
00015   m_ui->setupUi(this);
00016 
00017   QGLFormat format;
00018   // set the number of samples for multisampling
00019   // will need to enable glEnable(GL_MULTISAMPLE); once we have a context
00020   format.setSamples(4);
00021   #if defined( DARWIN)
00022     // at present mac osx Mountain Lion only supports GL3.2
00023     // the new mavericks will have GL 4.x so can change
00024     format.setVersion(3,2);
00025   #else
00026     // with luck we have the latest GL version so set to this
00027     format.setVersion(4,5);
00028   #endif
00029   // now we are going to set to CoreProfile OpenGL so we can't use and old Immediate mode GL
00030   format.setProfile(QGLFormat::CoreProfile);
00031   // now set the depth buffer to 24 bits
00032   format.setDepthBufferSize(24);
00033 
00034   m_gl=new GLWindow(format, this);
00035   m_ui->s_mainWindowGridLayout->addWidget(m_gl,0,0,2,1);
00036 
00037   connect(m_ui->m_wireframe,SIGNAL(toggled(bool)),m_gl,SLOT(toggleWireframe(bool)));
00038 
00039 }

00046 void MainWindow::on_loadB_clicked()
00047 {
00048   QFileDialog dialog(this);
00049   dialog.setFileMode(QFileDialog::ExistingFile);
00050   QStringList filters;
00051   filters << tr("Obj (*.obj)") << tr("All Files (*)");
00052   dialog.setNameFilters(filters);
00053   dialog.setViewMode(QFileDialog::Detail);
00054   QStringList fileNames;
00055   if(dialog.exec())
00056   {
00057     fileNames = dialog.selectedFiles();
00058   }
00059   if (fileNames.size() > 0)
00060   {
00061 
00062     QString fileName = fileNames.at(0);
00063     std::cout << fileName.toLocal8Bit().constData() <<std::endl;
00064     std::cout << fileName.size()-fileName.lastIndexOf("/") << std::endl;
00065 
00066     QString file = fileName.split("/",QString::SkipEmptyParts).back().split(".",QString::SkipEmptyParts).front();
00067     QStringList fileNameFull = fileName.split("/",QString::SkipEmptyParts);
00068 
00069     QString path = "/";
00070 
00071     for (int i = 0; i < fileNameFull.size()-1; ++i)
00072     {
00073       path.append(fileNameFull.at(i));
00074       path.append("/");
00075     }
00076 
00077     std::cout<<path.toLocal8Bit().constData()<<std::endl;
00078     m_gl->m_lods.clear();
00079     m_ui->pathLE->setText(fileName);
00080     m_ui->fileNameL->setText(file);
00081     m_gl->filepath = path.toLocal8Bit().constData();
00082     m_gl->file = file.toLocal8Bit().constData();
00083     m_gl->setModelLOD(fileName.toLocal8Bit().constData());
00084     m_ui->nFaces->setMaximum(m_gl->getModelLODTri()->getNumFaces()-1);
00085     m_ui->nFaces->setValue(m_gl->getModelLODTri()->getNumFaces()-1);
00086     m_ui->m_lods->setCurrentRow(m_gl->m_selectedModel);
00087     m_gl->updateAllLODs();
00088 
00089   }
00090 }

00092 void MainWindow::on_m_lods_clicked(const QModelIndex &index)
00093 {
00094   std::string str = index.data().toString().toLocal8Bit().constData();
00095   if (str == "BaseMesh")
00096   {
00097     if (m_gl->getModelLODTri() != NULL)
00098     {
00099       m_ui->nFaces->setMaximum(m_gl->getModelLODTri()->getNumFaces()-1);
00100       m_ui->nFaces->setValue(m_gl->getModelLODTri()->getNumFaces()-1);
00101     }
00102   }
00103   else
00104     {
00105 
00106     m_ui->nFaces->setMaximum(m_gl->getLODs()[m_gl->m_selectedModel]->getNumFaces()-1);
00107     m_ui->nFaces->setValue(m_gl->getLODs()[m_gl->m_selectedModel]->getNumFaces()-1);
00108     }
00109   m_gl->m_selectedModel = m_ui->m_lods->currentRow();
00110   m_gl->extUpdateGL();
00111 
00112 }

00114 void MainWindow::on_deleteLODB_clicked()
00115 {
00116   if (m_ui->m_lods->currentRow() != 0)
00117   {
00118     //delete(m_gl->m_lods[m_gl->m_selectedModel]);
00119     m_ui->m_lods->takeItem(m_ui->m_lods->currentRow());
00120     m_gl->m_selectedModel = 0;
00121     m_ui->m_lods->setCurrentRow(0);
00122     m_gl->updateAllLODs();
00123     m_gl->extUpdateGL();
00124   }
00125 }

00127 void MainWindow::on_createLODB_clicked()
00128 {
00129   m_gl->createLOD(m_ui->nFaces->value());
00130   QString id = SSTR(m_gl->getLODs().size()).c_str();
00131   m_gl->updateAllLODs();
00132   m_ui->m_lods->addItem(id);
00133   m_ui->m_lods->setCurrentRow(m_gl->allModels.size()-1);
00134   m_gl->extUpdateGL();
00135 }
